about.title: Our Story
about.paragraph1: Neural LAB was born from frustration with traditional agencies that treat AI projects like commodities. We've seen too many projects fail not due to lack of technology, but lack of true understanding of client needs.
about.paragraph2: Based in Muzambinho, in the heart of Minas Gerais mountains, we combine the solidity of Brazilian engineering with modern artificial intelligence innovation. Our approach is different: we're not just suppliers, we're partners.
about.paragraph3: Each project is an opportunity to create something truly unique. We work side by side with our clients, deeply understanding their challenges and objectives before writing the first line of code.
about.paragraph4: If you're looking for a true partnership to transform your vision into reality, let's talk. We're here to build the future, one project at a time.

ownership.title: Sense of Ownership
ownership.description: We treat each project as if it were our own. Your success is our success.

partnership.title: True Partnership

innovation.title: Responsible Innovation

chat.title: Neural LAB AI
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm Neural LAB's AI. How can I help you today? ü§ñ

responses.services: I understand your question! At Neural LAB, we develop custom AI solutions for businesses. What kind of project do you have in mind?
responses.capabilities: Great question! Our services include chatbot development, AI data analysis, and process automation. Would you like to know more about any specific one?
responses.interest: We're happy about your interest! We can schedule a conversation to discuss how AI can transform your business. What's the best time for you?
responses.experience: Excellent! We have experience in various sectors. Tell me more about your company and the challenges you face.
responses.contact: Perfect! Our team is ready to help. How about scheduling a call to better understand your needs?

bio.title: About Anderson
bio.paragraph1: AI Systems Engineer passionate about creating solutions that transform data into valuable insights. Currently studying Computer Science, with a focus on Machine Learning and intelligent systems development.
bio.paragraph2: Founder of Neural LAB, I combine solid academic knowledge with practical experience in AI product development. I believe artificial intelligence should grow organically, adapting to the specific needs of each project.
bio.paragraph3: When I'm not coding or studying new algorithms, I enjoy exploring the mountains of Minas Gerais and reflecting on how technology can improve people's lives. Each project is an opportunity to learn and create something truly impactful.
